name: Send data from Datastore search results via HTTP action
description: Streamline your data management process by automatically sending information from your datastore to an external application. With this template, every time a record is searched in your datastore, Make will seamlessly send the relevant data to your specified endpoint via HTTP. This integration enhances your workflow efficiency, ensuring that you can easily share and utilize your data across different platforms without manual intervention. Perfect for users looking to automate data transfers and improve their operational productivity!
